very clean shower room , pictures, toilet just glistens.  well done.  very nice truck driver

Wow. I check in your a shower and get a code immediately. I go to the shower and it had not been cleaned. Neither one was clean. When I asked the front if I could at least get towels, they commenced arching about who dropped the ball and ‚Ä¶

Decent truck stop, shower available for truckers and attached McDonalds if you eat fast food and want a quick bite.
The shower was somewhat dirty but my bleach got it clean. Overall it was ok.
Good place for a shower  and to stock up on what you may need

‚Ä¶ lol. Well, he waited and after he asked someone and the worker announced that she should come back to her store(subway) the guy was upset and as I said she was not happy to be there. The towels in the shower too was needing an updating. ‚Ä¶
If you can‚Äôt get a shower during the day, don‚Äôt try overnight here. Makes no sense to renovate a store, but fail to provide sufficient assistance for overnight. ‚Ä¶
